revised_title: Investigations into the Proportions of Oxygen in Oxygenized and Hyperoxygenized Muriatic Acid
tldr: The author investigates the proportions of oxygen in oxygenized and hyperoxygenized muriatic acid through a series of experiments and combinations with potash. The findings reveal the proportions of oxygen and muriatic acid in these compounds, providing insight into their chemical properties and reactions.
